help-file.title: "RAISE LICH"
help-file.content:
Area of effect: <corpse> Aggressive: No Cumulative: No Duration: Animation lasts until undead follower dies (again) Type of spell: Summoning
If the Necromancer has a suitable corpse at his feet, "Raise Lich" re-animates the corpse with the formidable power of a Lich. Liches by nature are powerful Sorcerers, but their undead prowess allows them to cause considerable damage with their bare hands as well.
